name: Over A Coffee
description:
Content warning: This game features a conversation about an abusive ex.

Adrian's meeting up with their friend Carmen to catch up. They have something important and difficult to tell her, can they get the words out?

A visual novel, made with ren'py.

By team Double Toad Seven for the Safe Spaces Now 2021 game jam.
Art by S.Doyly
Music by Leaf Let
Writing by Eleanor (Ammie)
Programming by SuperBiasedGary
